item.description:
Have you heard Godâ€™s call to your heart and soul, a call that can make you wonder how or why God would call on you or any human in our imperfection and fickleness? Do you wonder what you have to offer to the Creator of the universe? The answer is simple: love. The God of love calls out to every soul to return to a relationship of mutual love and co-creation. Will you answer the call? Join with us to contemplate what it would be like to answer, "Yes!"

Suggested Donation: $35 - Bring a Friend for Free! Light Lunch Included.
item.name: But What Can I Give to God? with Mother Clare Watts
